div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die Januarij
Anno quosupra

Eodem die Johannes Nidry constituit creauit et nominauit gilbertum
menyeis et Richardum Waus Juniorem

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimosextimo
die mensis Januarij Anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de abirdene vicesimo septimo die mensis Januarij
Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quarto coram honorabilibus viris thoma
lesly thomas Waus et Dauid steuart tribus balliuorum dictj burgj in pretorio
eiusdem in curia balliuorum protribunali sedenti per subscriptos videlicet Robertum
blinseil Dauid menyeis alexandrum reid Johannem Wormet gilbertum menyeis
Jacobum collisone Johannem Ratre Dauid mar Willelmum colp matheum branche
patricium red' Richardum Waus Juniorem Alexandrum hay alexandrum malison' henricum
Red Johannem chapman et Willelmum rolland' burgenses dictj burgj Qui
Jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus andreas gray capellanus auunculus magistrj andree
craufurd capellanj latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de
feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostrj Regis de quadam terra anteriore Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj inter
terram quondam Dauid spens ex australi ex vna et terram quondam thome cullan
ex boreali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et terram
Interiore alexandri Ranysone versus occidens Et quod dictus magister andreas
est legittimis et propinquior heres dictj quondam Andree auunculi
suj de dicta terra cum pertinencijs Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta
terra valet inter per annum xiij s' et quatuor denarios Et valuit
decim solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus
dominj nostri regis legittime per seipsum ob decessum dicti quondam domini andree
per spacium quinque ebdomidarum aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus
suum huiusque minime prosequentis Datis et clausis et cetera

The said day comperit ser Androw collisoun' chapelane of Sanct stewins
altir befor the bailyeis ande exponit to thame the procuratouris of Dauy
prat clamyt ane annuell Rent of xvj s' of ane land' pertenyng to him
as chaplane of the saide altir quhilk thai hed' Na Richt to for resonable'
caus' to be schawin tyme and place quayr it efferis besekand' the
bailyeis that thai wauld' direct' Nane officiar to pas with na procura
tour nor persone to punde the said' land' in the Name of the said Dauy
vnto the tyme that he war lauchfully warnit tharto that he micht
be present ande direngye the said' pundes with the perell of lawe as efferis

The saide day the actioun' persevin be thomas chamer one gilbert
menyeis caucionare for vmquhile Alexander chamer anent gudis of airschipe
pertening to him as ayr to vmquhile Williame of chamer et cetera Is continevit
to this day xv dais to the hamecumin of thomas chamer his Eme

Eodem die Johannes Rolland fecit constituit creauit et Nominauit Alexandrum
Kintor suum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem actorem et factorem Dans et concedens
eidem et suis substitutis pluribus aut viij suam liberam et integram potestatem
ad petendum et Recipiendum a Roberto murray xiij s' Et expensas inde Susten'
Et si necesse fuerit eundem Robertum prosequendum agendum defendendum Promit
tens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis
necessariis et Oportunis et cetera

Alexander couper amerciatur in defectu presencie quia non comparuit ad prosequendum Johanne
myle et cetera

Andreas lamyntoun amerciatur in defectu presencie quia premunitus vocatus Et non com
peruit et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die mensis
Januarij anno quo supra

The said day Robert crag complenit to the bailyeis that Johnne gordone sone and'
appering ayr to Johnne gordoun' of lungar Richerd crukschank and Johne pater
sone his seruandis hed' cumin to his hous' vnder silence of the Nicht and strubulit him
and Johnne crage his Sone quhilk the saidez Johnne Richerd and' Johnn' denyit
And Incontinent thareftir with consent of baitht the said' partiis the said actioun'
was put to the decesioun of ane assis' quhilkis riplie auisit the grait aithe suorn'
fand and deliuerit the said' Johnne Richerd' and' Johnne quyt of ale stribulance
of the said' Robert crag Johnne crag and of his hous' be Alexander menyeis
forspekar of the said' assis'

Eodem die gilbertus menyeis Johannes murray deuenerunt plegij legales per manuum
suarum ostecionez quod Robertus crag Johannes crag filius eius erunt Indempnes pro
Johanne gordone filio et heredj apparenti Johannis gordoun' de lungar aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dictus Johannes deuenit plegius legalis per manus ostencione quod prefatj Robertus et
Johannes crage erunt indempnes pro Ricardo crukschank et Johanne patersoun' aliter
quam per viam Juris et cetera Et Alexander menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod
dictus Johannes crage et Robertus crage erunt indempnes pro dicto Johannes
Richardus et Johannes erunt Indempnes pro Roberto crag et Johanne crag aliter
quam per viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum dictos suos
plegios indempnes pro huiusmodi fideuiscione

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die mensis Januarij anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo quinto

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to Androw meldrum to
ansuer' to Johne listar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of x s'

The saide day Robert of murray grantit him avande to Johne rollande
xiij s' scottis money quhilkis the balyeis chargit him pay within terme
of law

Eodem die nicholaius bewmonde conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Duncanj Colisone prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Rabvrne Carnificis Cuj
emendabit ut Jura volunt Et dictus Johannes quitus de perturbio prefati nicholaij
Cera Et Idem nicholayus Soluet ad lumen sancti Sanguinis vnam lb' cere in
partem emende

Eodem die Alexander prat conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Duncani Colisone
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Raburne Carnificis Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt Et dictus Johannes conuictus de perturbio prefati Alexandri Et Idem Alexander soluet ad
lumen Sancti sanguinis vnam libram Cere in partem emende

The saide day Alexander hay was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Duncane
Colisone forspekar for breking of the Statut' and ordinance of the tovne that he
Raid nocht with the Abbat and prior of bonacorde et one Sanct nicholes
day to decor' the towne eftir the auld' lovabile consuetud' of the sammyn'

The saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit be ane Suorne assis' Duncan colison' forspekar
that gif euire Nicholl bevmonde and Alexander prat or ony ane of tham hapinnis to
trubule Johne Riburne or yet the siade Johne to perturbe ony ane of tham Ilke
persone committing trubulance sale pay xxti s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
the saide partiis being oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stande to the saide deliuer
ance

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit be the aldirman ballieis and counsale
that euire nychtbour Induellar' of this burghe' sal byg and vpmak thar' dikis bak dikis
Syddkikis and ale vthir partis of thar' yardis quharthrow thar nichtbouris may be skathtles
tharof In tyme to Cum Ande this vndir the payn' of brekin of common ordinance
Ande the partj be or persone brekande this Statut and commone ordinance and beis conuict'
tharof sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin Ande mak satisfa
ctioun' and reconpensacioun' to the partj and personis thar' nychtbouris of the skatht
Sustenit be thame in defalt of nychtburschipe Ande Ilkane tennent Inha
bitan' the landis quhar the dikis happinnis to be falty sal vpmak and big
the saide dikis and the expens' maide be thame tharupoun' salbe allouit
in thar malys

The saide day the aldirmane ballieis ande diuers' of the Counsale ande
Communite representande the body of the towne Riplie avisit grauntit
fre licence ande leyf Ande be this present actis licencis ande lewis thar
familiar' clerk mastir Androw Crauferde chapellane perpertuale of Sanct
Peteris altar for ale the termes of fywe yeris Immediatlie next hereftir
to pas' quhar' euire he emples' prayande for the Saulis of the
foundouris of the Samyne sayfer' as thai may for the bigyne ande
reformacioun' done and to be done vpoun' ane tennent and lande pertening
to the saide altar quhilk is Ruinous' and standis In poynt of tynsele
without It be Reformit biggit and mendit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die februarij anno quo supra

The saide day Androu burnat skynnar grantit him aving to the spous'
of gilbert litstar aucht stanez' of wole als' gude Stuf as scho
cane preiwe he saulde to hir quhilkis he gravntit to pay within terme
of law Ande In continent the ballieis chargit him to pay the saide
wole within terme of law

The saide day Comperit ane Richt worschipfule nam sere thomas
myrtone thesaurar' of Abirdene and producit ane lettir vndir oure
Souerane lordis preue Seile of assignacioun' of ane croft liand'
beside the Justice myln' and hous' at the gallougate and of ale
the malis of the Samyn gevin and grantit be our Souerane lordis
hienes to margaret Prat and hir' assignez for al tym' thai haue
bene In the handis of his gude grace and for to Cum be Nonentres'
of the Richtuis' ayris or ayris and of the fermis pertening tharto
beseking the balyeis to caus' hir' be Obeit in the samyn'
efitr the tenor of the saide lettir to the quhilkis the saide balyeis
Reuerentlie and Obedientlie grauntit tile Obey

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to patry
chernside tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Alexander prat for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of xli li' and demi of hempe

The saide day patry chernside grantit to ger' his wyf cum one monunday
that next cumis ande schew hir' deffens anent xv s' of maile
clamit be Cristy Prat or eliis he salde Ansuer' to him for the saide
maile

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Duncan Colison'
forspekar that William Kintor sale preiwe Samekile' of his maile pait
to William Colp or to Dauy his Sone And specialie of the Costis and
expens' maid' one the hous' that he has in tak one the law
day next eftir Pasche Immediate follouing And quhat beys vnpait
he sall pay It to the saide Williame or Dauid

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Duncane Colisone
forspekar that charlis smitht hede done wrand in the brekin of ane suerd'
pertening to Williame verte for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court
and aw to mak the saide Suerde als'gude as it was or ellis pay the price
of It to the saide Williame

The saide day Williame Colp warnit Williame of Kintor to flytt and Rede
the hous' quhilkis he Inhabitis pertening to Dauy Colp his Sone as ayr
tutor datiwe to Isabele of buchane at Witsonday that next cumis and
taxt one him v s' and j d' Ilkane day that he Sett in the saide lande
eftir Witsonday

The saide day mastir Alexander masse Complenyeit to the balyeis that gilbert tulidef
wranguislie held' fra him the maile of ane bakhous' tua yeris bigane
extending to xviij s' in the yer' Ande the saide gilbert tuk to prewe him
pait of the saide maile befor the balyeis the viij day of the saide februar'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis februarij Anno quosupra et cetera

The said day criste Walcar grantit him awand to Duncane gilrutht
for the quhilkis James Kennerty come souerte to pay within
terme of lawe et cetera

The said day the wif of Patrik chirnside' allegit that the xv s' of maile
clamyt be cristofer Prat was sequesterit be my lord of Abirdenis lettres
and sche tuk friday that nixt cumis to preiwe the saide allegeance

The saide day Patry chirnsid' lauchfuly callit and nocht comperit to
ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Alexander prat for the wrang
wis' withhaldin fra him of xlj pund and ane half of hemp And' the
bailyeis chargit ormund' leslie sergeand' to tak ane strace of the said
patriis and latt it to borgh' giff it be askit Ande warne him to
friday that nixt cumis to ansuer to the said' borgh'

The said day the actioun' of ayrschipe pertenyng to thomas
chamer was continewit to the morne eftir the fest of Sanct ma
thowe with the consent of the said' thomas vnder hoip of con
cord' et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xiijto die mensis februarij anno d quo supra

The said day comperit Robert chepman' sone and ayr tile vm
quhile thomas chepman' burges of the said burghe' And thar
producit ane bile of the quhilkis the tenour follouis / Schir
bailyeis ples' your mastirschippis to wit that I Robert chepman
sone and ayr tile vmquhile thomas chepman burges of the
said burgh' declaris vnto your M that I was compellit
circumuenit and brocht befor youe the vij day of the monetht
of februar Instant in your court be Alexander hay of mou
quhalis and sere gilbert angye quhilkis get me say agane
my wile throwe awe and dreddour that I wauld' cheis'
thame my curatis et cetera how beit that I was vnder censuris
of cursing be my lord' of Abirdenis lettres throue contimax
Neuyrtheles' now I ame at fredome at my wile tharfor'
I Reuok ale and sundrie thingis that I said or did befor'
youe and sere Johne stirueling Notar and in ale vthir
plaicis be caus I was compellit and circumuenit be thame
Atour I ask ane Inquest of the court gif I be vteuch' tutory
and of lauchfule aige to cheis' me a Curatis eftir our
Soueran lordis lawis of the burgh' thar sene I ame
now at fredome that I may cheis' my curatouris to
gouerne my persone landis and gudis quhile I cum to perfit
age And nowe I the saide Robert nocht circumuenit compellit nor constrengyeit
bot of my awin free will and motiwe I cheis' makis constitutis ande
ordanis Williame futhes James collisoun' and Duncan collisoune
coniunctly and Seueraly my curatis Irreuocable to Intromett Reule
and gouerne me my landis and gudis to my proffit ay and quhile I
cum to perfit age eftir the forme of oue Souerane lordis lawis
And tharupone ser Notar I ask ane Instrument And your'
Seilis sere bailyeis I ask and protestis to be appensit to the samyn
And this writ to be extentit and delatit sere Notar in the sic
kerast wis' ye cane or May one my expens' et cetera Robertus chepman
manu propria et cetera

The saide day Robert chepman assignit the ferme and malys of his lande
liande in futy and this towne to Williame futhes James Colison' and Duncan
Colisone his Curatis to Sustene him in mett drink and clatht quhile
he cum to perfit Age

The saide day Androw Cullane askit xiiij s' of maile fra mathow branche
extentis vij li' of hempe / quhilkis the saide mathow allegit pait Ande tuk
to preiwe his pament one mununday that nixt cumis befor the balyeis

The saide day Elizabetht Waus exponit be Johne James Colisone hir forspekar
that it was presumit and dred' of the deide of Dauy prat hir Sone and cristy prat
his procurator hede his Seile and chartiris in kepin tharfor scho protestit Solemptlie
quhat euire he did' tharwitht suld' turne the ayris of the saide' Dauy to nay
preiudice

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die mensis
februarij anno quo supra

The saide day comperit Robert blinsele forspekar for Androw mortymer and Solempt
lie protest quhat euire was done be Robert chepman Sone and ayr to
vmquhile thomas chepman suld' nocht turne the saide Androvis wif nor barnis
to preiudice sene scho is appering ayr' to the saide Robert

The saide day Johne Raburne was conuict be ane suorne assis' Androu
cullane forspekar for stribulance of Williame Raburne his bruthir for
the quhilk he was in ane amerciament of the court and to amend as
lawe wile and' forbeir in tye to cum Ande the saide Williame
was quiet of ale stribulance done to the said Johnne And' atour
it was deliuerit be the said assis' that gif euere the said Johnne offendis
to the said William and' beis conuict tharof pay sale xl s' to sanct nicholes
werk vneforgevin And' the said Johne sale pay ane pund of walx
to the haly blud lycht in part of the recompensing of the said stribulance
And' the said William sale Remew and expell Ele cromak out of his
hous' fir Sesing of tribull betuix him and his said bruthir and his wif

Eodem die Dauid coupar deuenit plegius legalis quod Willelmus Rabvrne
erit Indempnos pro Johanni Raburne aliter quam per viam Juris Et Robertus
flesser deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit in dempnis pro
dicto Willelmo aliter quam per viam Juris Et vtrumque pars of obligatur' ad
conseruandum suos plegeos Indempnes

The said day the borgh' fundin one patry chirnsid be Alexander part
for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of xlj li' and ane
half of hemp was fundin awaile be ane suorne assis' Androw
cullan forspekar for the quhilk the said patry was in ane
amerciament of the court and aw to pay the said hempe

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Androw cullan for
spekar that Dauid brois' in the Name of his wif sale pay
xvj d' to Androw skynnar Incontinent

The said day Androw nachtj grantit to deliuer to Alexander nory
ij elne and ane hald of grene clatht one friday that nixt cumis
